ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Indicates that the named group having an ECInstance of the decorated ECClass should owns its members.
Indicates that this ECRelationship class should not have a BIS base class applied to it.
Provides hints on which ECClasses should be considered for mixin conversion as well as how to select their AppliesToEntityClass property.

ECProperty.description: The base class for all ECClasses that should be considered for mixin conversion
The base class for all ECClasses that should not be considered for mixin conversion
